Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Requires policies for the use of automatic license plate reader systems
Summary: Requires every business, individual, partnership, corporation, association, or state or local government non-law enforcement entity which uses an automatic license plate reader system to adopt a policy governing the use of such system and conspicuously post such policy on its website or place of business.
LawCode: Add ยง397-b, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring policies for the use of automatic license plate reader systems
